title: serif and sans serif fonts found on website "creativebloq"
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202416im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mystery_fonts_also_6461.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202416im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mystery_fonts_6284.png)

[http://www.creativebloq.com/design/visual-trends-2014-11410446](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202416/http:/www.creativebloq.com/design/visual-trends-2014-11410446 "http://www.creativebloq.com/design/visual-trends-2014-11410446")

Font: 

 Cordale by Dalton Maag and Knockout 27 or 67 

Solved By: 

 [DPape](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202416/http:/typophile.com/user/3945 "View user profile.")
author: whatsmytype

comments.content:
The sans appears to be Knockout (Junior Bantamweight?):

[http://www.typography.com/fonts/knockout/overview/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202416/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/knockout/overview/ "http://www.typography.com/fonts/knockout/overview/")
Outrun by the Texan again...well done, Mr. Pape.
Interesting about the Knockout weights. So many weights, so little time! It's hard to say. I think they're both good guesses. Congrat's to you both! And thanks for your help!
